short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up Malayalam definitions by double-clicking words

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly look up Malayalam meanings of English words while browsing. Double-click any word to see its Malayalam definition in a pop-up. An essential tool for Malayalam language learners and anyone seeking instant English to Malayalam word meaning lookup
